patterns.name: Two Pointers
patterns.description: Use two pointers to iterate through data structures efficiently, often solving problems in O(n) time
whenToUse: Array is sorted or can be sorted
Need to find pairs with specific sum
commonMistakes: Forgetting to handle edge cases with empty arrays

patterns.name: Fast & Slow Pointers
patterns.description: Use two pointers moving at different speeds to detect cycles and find middle elements
commonMistakes: Missing edge cases for single/two node lists

patterns.name: Sliding Window
patterns.description: Maintain a window of elements and slide it across the data to find optimal solutions
whenToUse: Finding subarrays of fixed or variable size
commonMistakes: Missing edge cases for window size

patterns.name: Kadane Pattern
patterns.description: Find maximum sum subarray using dynamic programming approach

patterns.name: Prefix Sum
patterns.description: Precompute cumulative sums for efficient range queries

patterns.name: Merge Intervals
patterns.description: Merge overlapping intervals efficiently

patterns.name: Cyclic Sort
patterns.description: Sort numbers in range [1, n] by placing each number at its correct index

patterns.name: In-place Reversal of LinkedList
patterns.description: Reverse linked lists or parts of linked lists in-place
commonMistakes: Not handling edge cases (null, single node)

patterns.name: Stack
patterns.description: Use stack data structure for LIFO operations

patterns.name: Hash Maps
patterns.description: Use hash tables for O(1) lookups and frequency counting

patterns.name: Tree Breadth First Search
patterns.description: Traverse tree level by level using queue

patterns.name: Tree Depth First Search
patterns.description: Traverse tree using recursion or stack (preorder, inorder, postorder)

patterns.name: Graphs
patterns.description: DFS and BFS on graphs, handling cycles and connectivity

patterns.name: Island (Matrix Traversal)
patterns.description: DFS/BFS on 2D matrices to find connected components

patterns.name: Two Heaps
patterns.description: Use min heap and max heap to find medians efficiently

patterns.name: Subsets
patterns.description: Generate all subsets using backtracking

patterns.name: Modified Binary Search
patterns.description: Apply binary search on sorted/rotated arrays

patterns.name: Bitwise XOR
patterns.description: Use XOR properties to solve problems efficiently

patterns.name: Top 'K' Elements
patterns.description: Find top K elements using heaps or quick select

patterns.name: K-way Merge
patterns.description: Merge K sorted arrays using heap

patterns.name: Greedy Algorithms
patterns.description: Make locally optimal choices to find global optimum

patterns.name: 0/1 Knapsack (Dynamic Programming)
patterns.description: Solve optimization problems using dynamic programming
